trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides helpers for the Visual Basic Err object.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx Xxxxxx Xxxxx $xxxxxx$Xxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Performs the work for the Clear method of the Err object.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Visual Basic compiler uses this helper method to capture exceptions in the Err object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxx Xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$Xxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx.$$x$$x
